channel.title: ThaneCast
channel.description: A Thane mind is a horable thing to baste.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Testing the waters of the mind.
channel.itunes:author: Robin Gingerich
channel.itunes:summary: A Thane mind is a horable thing to baste.

item.title: Voicemail (if you didnt know what it was)
item.description:
Here it is VOICEMAIL!!!!!
ok so it was me taht recorded it but its a call from someone!
new voicemail number for all those that want to call in with questions (or answers). 206-984-2632 or 206-9-THANE-2
Call use it alot. Give me somthing to talk about.
Robin
item.dc:creator: Robin Gingerich
item.itunes:summary:
Here it is VOICEMAIL!!!!!
ok so it was me taht recorded it but its a call from someone!

item.title: Lorie's Surgery
item.description: This was recorded the day after the Surgery before I was aware of a few problems she was having on Tuesday. I have emailed several people, friends and family, letting them know what I knew as of 9:30 last night. This will be updated as I can. Any well wishing can be sent to ThaneCast@gmail.com no voice mails anymore I have lost the phone number due to no calls. Thanks! Robin
item.dc:creator: Robin Gingerich
item.itunes:summary:
This was recorded the day after the Surgery before I was aware of a few problems she was having on Tuesday. I have emailed several people, friends and family, letting them know what I knew as of 9:30 last night.
This will be updated as I can. Any well wishing can be sent to ThaneCast@gmail.com no voice mails anymore I have lost the phone number due to no calls.
Thanks! Robin

item.title: First Runner Up
item.description: This is an audio clip from Slice of Sci-Fi Show #35 where i DIDN'T win the Sci-Fi Channels Ipod Give away. Oh well... at least I got on the show right? :) Thanks Evo, Summer and Mike!
item.dc:creator: Robin Gingerich
item.itunes:summary:
This is an audio clip from Slice of Sci-Fi Show #35 where i DIDN'T win the Sci-Fi Channels Ipod Give away.
Oh well... at least I got on the show right? :)
Thanks Evo, Summer and Mike!

item.title: Merry Christmas everybody!
item.description: Welp, we made it thought another year! Merry Christmas! I'll have some more shows to follow later this week and all of next year. Take care. P.S. Michael, Evo, and Summer have a wonderful christmas (yes, I did say Evo too)
item.dc:creator: Robin Gingerich
item.itunes:summary:
Welp, we made it thought another year! Merry Christmas! I'll have some more shows to follow later this week and all of next year. Take care.
P.S. Michael, Evo, and Summer have a wonderful christmas (yes, I did say Evo too)

item.title: Michael and Evo_Winging It Bumper #2
item.description: The Second of the bumpers for Winging It. This has new music by me, made using Apple's GarageBand. I am allowing Michael and Evo full use of this song. Enjoy! Robin
item.dc:creator: Robin Gingerich
item.itunes:summary:
The Second of the bumpers for Winging It. This has new music by me, made using Apple's GarageBand. I am allowing Michael and Evo full use of this song.
Enjoy! Robin
